name: carolean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
from or relating to the period of British history during the rule of King Charles III (from 2022): What can we expect from the new Carolean age? The next era of British history under King Charles III will be known as the Carolean era.
from or relating to the period of British history during the rule of King Charles II (1660-1685): The Carolean era is also known as The Restoration. It was a beautiful Carolean house with all the original oak panelling. Compare

More examplesFewer examplesCharles II was fond of this sweet-tasting root, and deep-fried it was a favourite Carolean snack.This beautiful red brick mansion dating from 1584 demonstrates an exciting combination of Elizabethan, Jacobean, Carolean and 18th Century styles.
